Sports betting operators in Australia are entities licensed to offer wagering services on various sports events. These operators are regulated under state and territory laws, ensuring compliance with national standards for responsible gambling and consumer protection.

== Major Operators ==
In Australia, several major sports betting operators are licensed to provide services. These include:

* Sportsbet
* Ladbrokes
* TAB
* PointsBet
* Neds
* Unibet

== Licensing Status ==
Sports betting operators in Australia must obtain a license from the relevant state or territory authority. The Northern Territory is a popular licensing jurisdiction due to its favorable regulatory environment.
